articles.title: Home-Built 12-Rotor Wankel Engine Is The Definition Of Crazy - Motor1
articles.description: If you're crazy about rotary engine content, Rob Dahm is probably the YouTuber you follow. But right now, he's got the most bonkers rotary mill of them all.
articles.content: If you like video content that comes with the words Wankel, rotor, and rotary, Rob Dahm is probably one of the YouTubers you should follow. The man just loves his rotary, to the point that he's built… [+1822 chars]
